## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G11020](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G11020)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DREB2, DREB2B</u>
- **Gene Name:** DEHYDRATION-RESPONSIVE ELEMENT BINDING PROTEIN 2, DRE/CRT-binding protein 2B
- **Description:**   DRE/CRT-binding protein 2B;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2085527
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
